name: Dungeon Maker: Hunting Ground
overview: Dungeon Maker: Hunting Ground is an action RPG where the player creates their own unique dungeon using purchased pre-crafted pieces. Each day, as the player adds to his dungeon, wandering monsters come to inhabit it. The deeper the player builds his dungeon, the more deadly the monsters and their treasures. A deep and well-crafted dungeon might attract the ultimate evil creature for you to try and defeat using a variety of items, weapons, and spells that have been acquired along the way. The nearby city offers equipment, food, quests, and quirky characters to aid you in your adventure.
